title: iDesign Steel Free-Standing Paper Towel Holder, The Twigz Collection – 7.5" x 7.5" x 8", Bronze
features: COUNTERTOP PAPER TOWEL STAND - Streamline your kitchen organization with the iDesign Steel Paper Towel Holder; keeps paper towels clean, dry, and at hand by the sink until ready for use; accommodates most standard, mega, and jumbo-sized rolls
VERSATILE DESIGN - Use in the kitchen, or in any room around the home where you need to keep paper towels within reach
EASY TO INSTALL - Simply slide a paper towel roll onto the paper towels holder stand to set up - no mounting or installation required
DURABLE AND STYLISH - Crafted from rust-resistant stainless-steel construction, this paper towel dispenser stands up to everyday use; the bronze finish matches a variety of décor styles
EFFICIENT SIZE - The paper towel rack measures 7.5" x 7.5" x 8" to create instant kitchen storage in unused spaces
description: Streamline your kitchen organization and storage with the iDesign Twigz Collection Paper Towel Rack. It keeps paper towels clean, dry, and at hand. Accommodates most standard, mega, and jumbo-sized rolls. The paper towel holder is easy to install. Simply slide a paper towel roll onto the stainless-steel paper towel holder to set up - no mounting or installation required. Measuring 7.5" x 7.5" x 8", it creates instant storage in unused spaces in the kitchen. Or place it in any room around the home where you need to keep paper towels within reach. It pairs well with other items in the iDesign collection of kitchen accessories to provide complete home organization in every room. Crafted from a rust-resistant stainless-steel construction, this kitchen organizer is built to last. The bronze finish matches a variety of décor styles. With iDesign, you can live simply and sustainably every day.
